summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Streamlabs-like tipping page with Stripe integration. Backend APIs working well (87.5% success rate), frontend UI fully functional with successful Stripe checkout integration.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 500 status instead of 400 for invalid amount validation
minor_bugs.impact: Error handling could be improved but functionality works

passed_tests: Homepage loads with creator profile (avatar, name, bio)
All preset tip buttons ($5, $10, $25, $50, $100) clickable and functional
Custom amount input accepts decimal numbers
Tipper name and message inputs work correctly
Form validation shows error for missing amount
Redirect to Stripe payment page working
Success page loads and handles payment status
All backend API endpoints responding correctly
Creator profile GET and POST endpoints working
